column1: * Regent of Gondor Rómendacil II of Gondor - with the aid of Vidugavia
column2: King of  Rhovanion - leads a great force of troops and defeats the Easterlings in the lands between Rhovanion and the Sea of Rhûn. All Easterlings camps and settlements east of the Inland Sea are destroyed.

column1: * Minalcar takes the name Rómendacil II (East-victor) in celebration of his great victory over the Easterlings.

column2: the western shores of the Anduin are fortified and the pillars of the Argonath are erected at the entrance to Nen Hithoel.
